channel.title: dinner on Yum Yum at TechNative
channel.description: Recent content in dinner on Yum Yum at TechNative

item.title: Mulligatawny soup
item.description: A delicious comfort soup with a lot of veggies, herbs, and spices. Preparation: Heat 2 tablespoons of ghee in a soup pot. Sauté the chopped onions and garlic. Finely chop the dried chili peppers. Add them to the pot along with the cumin seeds, crushed coriander seeds, mustard seeds, turmeric, and madras curry powder. Sauté for a moment. Add the cinnamon stick and grated fresh ginger. Sauté briefly. Rinse the lentils.

item.title: Okonomiyaki
item.description: A Japanese streetfood dish Preparation: Whisk the eggs in a bowl. Add the flour and whisk until you have a smooth batter. Add the soy sauce, ginger, Chinese cabbage, bean sprouts, spring onion, garlic, and carrot to the batter. Stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Heat a little rice oil in a frying pan. Pour half of the batter into the pan and cook the omelette on both sides until cooked through and golden brown.

item.title: Roasted marinated tofu with broccoli
item.description: An easy and delicious meal! Preparation: Drain the tofu, wrap it in kitchen paper, and place something heavy on top to press out the moisture. Let it sit for at least 30 minutes. Mix the dark soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, brown sugar, ginger root, sriracha, sesame oil and garlic together in a large bowl. Remove the kitchen paper and cut the tofu into eight equal slices. Place them in the marinade and let them marinate for at least 30 minutes.

item.title: Savoury tart with spinach and ham and tomato
item.description: Preheat the oven to 180 degrees. Remove the puff pastry sheets from the freezer and let them come to room temperature. Meanwhile, cut the bell pepper into cubes and finely chop the garlic. Pour a very small dash of oil into a frying pan and let the spinach wilt over a low heat. Once it has shrunk squeeze out the liquid from the spinach using, for example, a sieve.

item.title: Spiral Zuccini Pie
item.description: Prerheat the oven to 180°C Cover a baking tin with the puff pastery Mix the quark, egg, lemon zest, half the dill, and season welli with salt and pepper. Spread into the cooked pastry case. Stack a handful of the courgette ribbons on top of each other, then start to roll into a pinwheel continually adding lengths. Position this into thecentre of the pasty case, on top of the quark mix, and, holding it in position with one hand, keep adding new outer layers to the wheel to create the circle.

item.title: Tomato stew with lentils and olives
item.description: A hearty one-pot dish packed with flavor. Preparation: Finely chop the onion and garlic. Heat oil in a pan and sauté the onion for about 5 minutes over medium heat. Add the garlic and sauté briefly. Dice the sweet potatoes and add them to the pan along with the spices and salt. Sauté them well. Rinse the red lentils and add them to the pan along with the diced tomatoes and tomato paste.
